plugins.publishCmd: echo '//registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken='$NPM_TOKEN > .npmrc && pnpm publish --access public --no-git-checks && echo '@blu1606:registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com' > .npmrc && echo '//npm.pkg.github.com/:_authToken='$NODE_AUTH_TOKEN >> .npmrc && pnpm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com --no-git-checks
